/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their red brick facades standing out against the clear blue sky. These buildings, with their numerous windows, add a sense of depth and scale to the image. The street itself is a hive of activity with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in urban landscapes. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
